body:
I built my environment, and it gave the following error at the end of the `env install` process.  Although I don't use `py-jupyter` directly, it *is* part of this env:

```
==> Updating view at /Users/eafischer2/spack/var/spack/environments/pismip6-catalina/.spack-env/view
==> Error: [Errno 2] No such file or directory: '/Users/eafischer2/spack/var/spack/environments/pismip6-catalina/.spack-env/view/bin/jupyter-run'
```

### Information on your system

See attached `spack.lock` describing my environment.

[spack.lock.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/4575685/spack.lock.txt)
title: Spack Environments w/ View and py-jupyter
